last_episode_to_air.name: Marginal Man
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Ho-jae's enemy threatens to hurt those closest to him, he risks everything to protect them. Will he survive the ferocious beasts and save Chae-ok?

name: Gyeongseong Creature
overview: Gyeongseong, 1945. In Seoul's grim era under colonial rule, an entrepreneur and a sleuth fight for survival and face a monster born out of human greed.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: 1945, Gyeongseong South Korea. Jang Tae-sang is a rich man. He is known as the most attractive man around Bukchon in Gyeongseong. He is also a reliable source for information in the area. His talents, including the ability to respond quickly to situations, keen insight and his sociability, have led him to his current position. When he comes into contact with Yoon Chae-ok, he has to reevaluate his priorities as a person.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In 2024 Seoul, fate-bound ties to Gyeongseong unravel when Chae-ok meets Ho-jae, a man with an uncanny resemblance to Tae-sang. What will destiny reveal?

tagline: Behold, the powers of destiny. Beware, the powers of karma.

episodes.name: Najin
episodes.overview: Facing financial ruin, Jang Tae-sang agrees to track down a missing person — but two figures trail him. Meanwhile, sinister operations occur underground.

episodes.name: Mother
episodes.overview: Yoon Chae-ok and Yoon Jung-won find a lead on Myeong-ja, leading them to a hospital. Soon, a calamity traps the two inside, leaving Tae-sang concerned.

episodes.name: Signal
episodes.overview: Tae-sang decides to reenter the hospital, but discovers that Ryu Sachimoto is nearby. At the hospital, Chae-ok and Jung-won devise a risky rescue plan.

episodes.name: Imprinting
episodes.overview: Reunited in their search for Myeong-ja, Tae-sang and Chae-ok attempt to also save other survivors. But soon, the monster makes itself known.

episodes.name: Desperation
episodes.overview: After coming face to face with the creature, Tae-sang and Chae-ok get captured. But as one plans his escape, the other stays to find a person dear to her.

episodes.name: Chaos
episodes.overview: Tae-sang steadfastly remains to save Chae-ok and the captives. On a mission to find her mother, Chae-ok learns the grisly truth — and confronts the beast.

episodes.name: Chase
episodes.overview: With only 10 minutes to act, Tae-sang and Chae-ok risk it all to get everyone to safety. But just as all goes to plan, one of them may not get out alive.

episodes.name: Awakening
episodes.overview: An unlikely acquaintance becomes Tae-sang's ticket out of the hospital. After a touching reunion, Tae-sang and Chae-ok encounter a transformed Myeong-ja.

episodes.name: Atrocity
episodes.overview: After a series of grisly deaths, Ishikawa finds Myeong-ja in her new state. Tae-sang shares a tender moment with Chae-ok, unaware of her hidden plan.

episodes.name: Tear
episodes.overview: In order to rescue Chae-ok and stop the atrocity, Tae-sang and Jung-won forge a plan. But just as the coast seems clear, Yukiko Maeda stands in the way.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: 1945, Gyeongseong South Korea. Jang Tae-sang is a rich man. He is known as the most attractive man around Bukchon in Gyeongseong. He is also a reliable source for information in the area. His talents, including the ability to respond quickly to situations, keen insight and his sociability, have led him to his current position. When he comes into contact with Yoon Chae-ok, he has to reevaluate his priorities as a person.

episodes.name: Ho-jae
episodes.overview: On a mission to clear his name, Jang Ho-jae searches for a mysterious woman. On the job, Chae-ok encounters a familiar person from decades ago.

episodes.name: Sign
episodes.overview: While looking for the same person, Ho-jae ends up saving Chae-ok, who's being chased by a mysterious being. Ho-jae begins to wonder more about his past.

episodes.name: Pieces Of Memories
episodes.overview: Chae-ok agrees to work with Ho-jae to find Seung-jo, but they soon find themselves in peril. Meanwhile, Chae-ok's monstrous instincts begin to surface.

episodes.name: The Other Side
episodes.overview: Ho-jae tries to piece together everything that has been hidden from him. Chae-ok discovers that the atrocities of the past continue to the present day.

episodes.name: The Creature
episodes.overview: In his effort to save Chae-ok, Ho-jae makes a momentous decision. Having sustained severe injuries, they must battle through a treacherous escape.

episodes.name: Bait
episodes.overview: After a test subject wreaks havoc in public, Jeonseung Biotech goes into damage control. Fate drives Ho-jae and Chae-ok to confront the company head-on.

episodes.name: Marginal Man
episodes.overview: As Ho-jae's enemy threatens to hurt those closest to him, he risks everything to protect them. Will he survive the ferocious beasts and save Chae-ok?

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In 2024 Seoul, fate-bound ties to Gyeongseong unravel when Chae-ok meets Ho-jae, a man with an uncanny resemblance to Tae-sang. What will destiny reveal?
